steps: decided to play a game during recess
find out who wants to play at recess
find out what everyone wants to play
agree upon a game and get the needed materials
meet outside on the playground at recess
pick teams and get ready to start the game

branching_info.branching_step: find out what everyone wants to play
branching_info.option 1: start a poll in the social media
branching_info.option 2: ask everyone just call out what they want
freeform_ra: have a favorite game in mind
